rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of cells of UE moving trajectory. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: Expected UE Activity Behaviour
descriptionList: This IE indicates information about the expected "UE activity behaviour" of the UE or the PDU session as defined in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: Expected Activity Period
elementList.description: If set to "181" the expected activity time is longer than 180 seconds. The remaining values indicate the expected activity time in [seconds].

elementList.name: Expected Idle Period
elementList.description: If set to "181" the expected idle time is longer than 180 seconds. The remaining values indicate the expected idle time in [seconds].

elementList.name: Source of UE Activity Behaviour Information
elementList.description: If "subscription information" is indicated, the information contained in the Expected Activity Period IE and the Expected Idle Period IE, if present, is derived from subscription information. If "statistics" is indicated, the information contained in the Expected Activity Period IE and the Expected Idle Period IE, if present, is derived from statistical information.

definitionList.name: AMF Region Information
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Global AMF Region IDs of the AMF Regions to which the NG-RAN node belongs.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of AMF Regions an NG-RAN node can be connected to. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: TNL Association Usage
descriptionList: This IE indicates the usage of the TNL association.

elementList.name: TNL Association Usage
elementList.description: Indicates whether the TNL association is only used for UE associated signalling, or non-UE associated signalling, or both.

definitionList.name: Network Instance
descriptionList: This IE provides the network instance to be used by the NG-RAN node when selecting a particular transport network resource as described in TS 23.501 [7].

definitionList.name: PDCP Duplication Configuration
descriptionList: The PDCP Duplication Configuration IE indicates whether PDCP Duplication is configured or de-configured.

definitionList.name: Secondary RAT Usage Information
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the Secondary RAT resources used by a PDU Session with MR-DC as specified in TS 37.340 [8].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of QoS flows allowed within one PDU session. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Volume Timed Report List
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the data usage.

elementList.name: Start Timestamp
elementList.description: UTC time encoded in the same format as the first four octets of the 64-bit timestamp format as defined in section 6 of IETF RFC 5905 [37]. It indicates the start time of the collecting period of the included Usage Count UL IE and Usage Count DL IE.

elementList.name: End Timestamp
elementList.description: UTC time encoded in the same format as the first four octets of the 64-bit timestamp format as defined in section 6 of IETF RFC 5905 [37]. It indicates the end time of the collecting period of the included Usage Count UL IE and Usage Count DL IE.

elementList.name: Usage Count UL
elementList.description: The unit is: octets.

elementList.name: Usage Count DL
elementList.description: The unit is: octets.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of time reporting periods. Value is 2.

definitionList.name: Maximum IP Rate
descriptionList: This IE indicates the maximum aggregate data rate for integrity protected DRBs for a UE as defined in TS 38.300 [9].

elementList.name: Maximum Integrity Protected Data Rate
elementList.description: Defines the upper bound of the aggregate data rate of user plane integrity protected data.

definitionList.name: UL Forwarding
descriptionList: This element indicates a proposal for forwarding of uplink packets.

definitionList.name: UE Radio Capability for Paging
descriptionList: This IE contains paging specific UE Radio Capability information.

elementList.name: UE Radio Capability for Paging of NR
elementList.description: Includes the RRC UERadioPagingInformation message as defined in TS 38.331 [10].

elementList.name: UE Radio Capability for Paging of E-UTRA
elementList.description: Includes the RRC UERadioPagingInformation message as defined in TS 36.331 [14].

definitionList.name: Common Network Instance
descriptionList: This IE provides the common network instance to be used by the NG-RAN node when selecting a particular transport network resource as described in TS 23.501 [7] in a format common with 5GC.

elementList.name: Common Network Instance
elementList.description: The octets of OCTET STRING are encoded as the Network Instance field of the Network Instance IE specified in TS 29.244 [45]

definitionList.name: Default DRB Allowed
descriptionList: This IE is used to indicate whether the SN is allowed to configure the default DRB for a PDU session or not.

definitionList.name: Split Session Indicator
descriptionList: This IE indicates whether admitting the requested resources results in a split PDU session.

definitionList.name: UL Forwarding Proposal
descriptionList: This IE indicates a proposal for forwarding of uplink packets.

definitionList.name: TNL Configuration Info
descriptionList: This IE is used for signalling IP addresses of GTP-U endpoints and additionally of IPSec endpoints used for establishment of IPSec tunnels.

elementList.name: Extended UP Transport Layer Addresses To Add List
Extended UP Transport Layer Addresses To Add Item
IP-Sec Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Layer Addresses for IP-Sec endpoint.

elementList.name: GTP Transport Layer Addresses To Add List
GTP Transport Layer Addresses To Add Item
GTP Transport Layer Address Info
elementList.description: GTP Transport Layer Addresses for GTP end-points.

elementList.name: Extended UP Transport Layer Addresses To Remove List
Extended UP Transport Layer Addresses To Remove Item
IP-Sec Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Layer Addresses for IP-Sec endpoint.

elementList.name: GTP Transport Layer Addresses To Remove List
GTP Transport Layer Addresses To Remove Item
GTP Transport Layer Address Info
elementList.description: GTP Transport Layer Addresses for GTP end-points.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Extended Transport Layer Addresses in the message. Value is 16.
Maximum no. of GTP Transport Layer Addresses for a GTP end-point in the message. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: NG-RAN Trace ID
descriptionList: This IE defines the NG-RAN Trace ID.

elementList.name: NG-RAN Trace ID
elementList.description: This IE is composed of the following: Trace Reference defined in TS 32.422 [23] (leftmost 6 octets, with PLMN information encoded as in 9.2.2.4), and Trace Recording Session Reference defined in TS 32.422 [23] (last 2 octets).

definitionList.name: Non-GBR Resources Offered
descriptionList: This IE indicates whether the MCG offers non-GBR resources for non-GBR QoS flows of the PDU Session Resource.

definitionList.name: Extended RAT Restriction Information
descriptionList: This element provides RAT restrictions as specified in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: Primary RAT Restriction
elementList.type: BIT STRING { e-UTRA (0), nR (1), nR-unlicensed (2), nR-LEO (3), nR-MEO (4), nR-GEO (5), nR-OTHERSAT (6), e-UTRA-LEO (7), e-UTRA-MEO (8), e-UTRA-GEO (9), e-UTRA-OTHERSAT (10)} (SIZE(8, …, 16))
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents a Primary RAT. If a bit is set to "1", the respective RAT is restricted for the UE. If a bit is set to "0", the respective RAT is not restricted for the UE. Bits 11-15 reserved for future use. The Primary RAT is the RAT used in the access cell, or target cell.

elementList.name: Secondary RAT Restriction
elementList.type: BIT STRING { e-UTRA (0), nR (1), e-UTRA-unlicensed (2), nR-unlicensed (3)} (SIZE(8, …))
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents a Secondary RAT. If a bit is set to "1", the respective RAT is restricted for the UE. If a bit is set to "0", the respective RAT is not restricted for the UE. Bits 4-7 reserved for future use. A Secondary RAT is a RAT, distinct from the UE’s primary RAT, used in any cell serving the UE excluding the PCell.

definitionList.name: 5GC Mobility Restriction List Container
descriptionList: This IE contains the Mobility Restriction List IE specified in TS 38.413 [5] as received by the NG-RAN from the 5GC.

elementList.name: 5GC Mobility Restriction List Container
elementList.description: The octets of the OCTET STRING are encoded according to the specifications of the Mobility Restriction List IE specified in TS 38.413 [5].

definitionList.name: Maximum Number of CHO Preparations
descriptionList: This IE indicates the maximum number of concurrently prepared CHO candidate cells for a UE at a candidate target NG-RAN node.

definitionList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set List
descriptionList: This IE contains alternative sets of QoS parameters which the NG-RAN node can indicate to be fulfilled when notification control is enabled and it cannot fulfil the requested list of QoS parameters.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: Maximum Data Burst Volume is specified in TS 23.501 [7]. This IE may be included if the Delay Critical IE is set to "delay critical" and is ignored otherwise.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of alternative sets of QoS Parameters allowed for the QoS profile. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Index
descriptionList: This IE indicates the QoS parameters set which can currently be fulfilled.

elementList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Index
elementList.description: Indicates the index of the item within the Alternative QoS Parameters Set List IE corresponding to the currently fulfilled alternative QoS parameters set.

definitionList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Notify Index
descriptionList: This IE indicates the QoS parameters set which can currently be fulfilled.

elementList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set Notify Index
elementList.description: Indicates the index of the item within the Alternative QoS Parameters Set List IE corresponding to the currently fulfilled alternative QoS parameters set. Value 0 indicates that NG-RAN cannot even fulfil the lowest alternative QoS parameters set.

definitionList.name: NR V2X Services Authorized
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the authorization status of the UE to use the NR sidelink for V2X services.

elementList.name: Vehicle UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Vehicle UE

elementList.name: Pedestrian UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Pedestrian UE

definitionList.name: LTE V2X Services Authorized
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the authorization status of the UE to use the LTE sidelink for V2X services.

elementList.name: Vehicle UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Vehicle UE

elementList.name: Pedestrian UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Pedestrian UE

definitionList.name: NR UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the Aggregate Maximum Bitrate of the UE’s sidelink communication.

elementList.name: NR UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate

elementList.name: LTE UE Sidelink Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
elementList.description: Value 0 shall be considered as a logical error by the receiving NG-RAN node.

elementList.description: Only applies for GBR QoS Flows.

elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate for the PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate for the PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.description: Only applies for non-GBR QoS Flows.

Maximum no. of PC5 QoS flows allowed towards one UE. Value is 2048.
NOTE: ASN.1 value definition of the maxnoofPC5QoSFlows is 2064. The size of the PC5 QoS Flow List shall not exceed 2048 items.

definitionList.name: UE History Information from the UE

NR Mobility History Report

elementList.description: This IE indicates information on the initial secondary RLC activation state of UL PDCP duplication. Each position in the list represents a secondary RLC entity in ascending order by the LCH ID in the order of MCG and SCG.

elementList.name: Primary RLC Indication
elementList.description: This IE is present when DC based PDCP duplication is configured. This IE indicates whether the primary RLC entity located at the assisting node.

definitionList.name: Redundant PDU Session Information
descriptionList: This IE provides Redundancy information to be applied to a PDU Session.

elementList.name: PDU Session Pair ID

definitionList.name: Extended Packet Delay Budget
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Packet Delay Budget for a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Extended Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: Upper bound value for the delay that a packet may experience expressed in unit of 0.01ms.

definitionList.name: TSC Traffic Characteristics
descriptionList: This IE provides the traffic characteristics of TSC QoS flows.

definitionList.name: TSC Assistance Information
descriptionList: This IE provides the TSC assistance information for a TSC QoS flow in the uplink or downlink (see TS 23.501 [7]).

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.description: Periodicity as specified in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: Burst Arrival Time
elementList.description: Burst Arrival Time as specified in TS 23.501 [7].

descriptionList: This IE indicates the Periodicity of the TSC QoS flow as defined in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: Periodicity

elementList.description: Encoded in the same format as the ReferenceTime IE as defined in TS 38.331 [10]. The value is provided with 1 us accuracy.

descriptionList: This IE provides the Redundant QoS Flow Indicator for a QoS flows as specified in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: Redundant QoS Flow Indicator
elementList.description: This IE indicates if this QoS flow is requested for the redundant transmission. Value "true" indicates that redundant transmission is requested for this QoS flow. Value "false" indicates that redundant transmission is requested to be stopped if started.

definitionList.name: NPN Mobility Information
descriptionList: This information element indicates the access restrictions related to an NPN.

elementList.description: Allowed SNPNs in addition to Serving SNPN. This list corresponds to the list of "equivalent SNPNs" as defined in TS 24.501 [30]. This list is part of the roaming restriction information. Roaming restrictions apply to SNPNs other than the Serving SNPN and Equivalent SNPNs.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of equivalent SNPNs. Value is 15.

definitionList.name: Allowed PNI-NPN ID List
descriptionList: This IE contains information on allowed UE mobility in PNI-NPN including allowed PNI-NPNs and whether the UE is allowed to access non-CAG cells for each PLMN.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of equivalent PLMNs plus one serving PLMN. Value is 16.
Maximum number of CAGs per PLMN in UE’s Allowed PNI-NPN ID List. Value is 256.

definitionList.name: NPN Paging Assistance Information
descriptionList: This IE contains NPN Paging Assistance Information.

descriptionList: This IE indicates whether the UE is allowed to access cells that support PNI-NPNs for a PLMN.

elementList.name: PNI-NPN Restricted Information
elementList.description: If set to "restricted", the IE indicates that the UE is not allowed to access non-CAG cells for a PLMN.

definitionList.name: URI
descriptionList: This IE is defined to contain a URI address.

elementList.name: URI

descriptionList: The IE defines the MDT configuration parameters.

elementList.name: MN only MDT collection

elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Immediate MDT only, Immediate MDT and Trace, Logged MDT only, ...)

elementList.name: Cell based
elementList.description: If PNI-NPN Area Scope of MDT IE is present, this IE covers non-CAG cells only, where non-CAG cells refer to cells that only provide public access.

elementList.name: TA based
elementList.description: If PNI-NPN Area Scope of MDT IE is present, this IE covers non-CAG cells only, where non-CAG cells refer to cells that only provide public access.

elementList.name: TAC
elementList.description: The TAI is derived using the current serving PLMN.

elementList.name: TAI based
elementList.description: If PNI-NPN Area Scope of MDT IE is present, it covers non-CAG cells only, where non-CAG cells refer to cells that only provide public access.

elementList.name: SNPN Cell ID List for MDT
NID
elementList.description: Identifies an SNPN together with the PLMN Identity in the NR CGI IE.

elementList.name: NID
elementList.description: Identifies an SNPN together with the PLMN Identity IE.

elementList.name: NID
elementList.description: Identifies an SNPN together with the PLMN Identity IE.

elementList.name: Measurements to Activate
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap indicates a MDT measurement, as defined in TS 37.320 [43]. First Bit = M1, Second Bit= M2, Fourth Bit = M4, Fifth Bit = M5, Sixth Bit = logging of M1 from event triggered measurement reports according to existing RRM configuration, Seventh Bit = M6, Eighth Bit = M7. Value "1" indicates "activate" and value "0" indicates "do not activate". This version of the specification does not use bits 3.

elementList.name: MDT Location Information
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents requested location information as defined in TS 37.320 [43]. First Bit = GNSS Other bits are reserved for future use and are ignored if received. Value "1" indicates "activate" and value "0" indicates "do not activate". The eNB shall ignore the first bit unless the Measurements to Activate IE has the first bit or the sixth bit set to "1".

elementList.name: Logging interval
elementList.description: Corresponds to information provided in the LoggingInterval IE as defined in TS 38.331 [10]. The value "infinity" represents one shot logging, i.e., only one log per event in the logged MDT report.

elementList.name: Logging duration
elementList.description: Corresponds to information provided in the LoggingDuration IE as defined in TS 38.331 [10]. Unit: [minute].

elementList.name: Early Measurement
elementList.description: This IE indicates whether the UE is allowed to log measurements on early measurement related frequencies in logged MDT as specified in TS 38.331 [10].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Cell ID subject for MDT scope. Value is 32.
Maximum no. of TA subject for MDT scope. Value is 8.
Maximum no. of SNPNs in the MDT SNPN list. Value is 16.

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the Measurements to Activate IE has the first bit set to "1".
This IE shall be present if the Measurements to Activate IE has the fourth bit set to "1".
This IE shall be present if the Measurements to Activate IE has the fifth bit set to "1".
This IE shall be present if the Measurements to Activate IE has the seventh bit set to "1".
This IE shall be present if the Measurements to Activate IE has the eighth bit set to "1".

definitionList.name: MDT Configuration-EUTRA

elementList.name: MDT Activation
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(Immediate MDT only, Immediate MDT and Trace, Logged MDT only, ...)

elementList.name: TAC
elementList.description: The TAI is derived using the current serving PLMN.

elementList.description: MDTMode IE defined in TS 36.413 [31].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Cell ID subject for MDT scope. Value is 32.
Maximum no. of TA subject for MDT scope. Value is 8.

elementList.description: Corresponds to information provided in the RSRQ-Range IE as defined in TS 38.331 [10].

elementList.name: Report amount
elementList.description: Corresponds to information provided in the reportAmount as defined in TS 38.331 [10] and represents the number of reports.

elementList.name: Extended Report interval
elementList.description: This IE is the extension of Report interval IE and corresponds to information provided in the ReportInterval IE as defined in TS 38.331 [10]. If this IE is present, the Report interval IE is ignored.

elementList.name: Include Beam Measurements Indication

elementList.name: Beam Measurements Report Quantity

elementList.name: MaxNrofRS-IndexesTo Report
elementList.description: Indicates the max number of beam measurements to be reported and corresponds to information provided in the maxNrofRS-IndexesToReport as defined in TS 38.331 [10].

conditionList.explanation: This IE shall be present if the Measurements to Activate IE has the first bit set to "1" and the M1 Reporting Trigger IE is set to "A2event-triggered" or to "A2event-triggered periodic".
This IE shall be present if the M1 Reporting Trigger IE is set to "periodic", or to "A2event-triggered periodic".
This IE shall be present if the Include Beam Measurements Indication IE is set to "true".

Maximum no. of SRB allowed towards one UE, the maximum value is 5.

definitionList.name: SRB ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a SRB for a UE.

elementList.name: SRB ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to information provided either in the SRB-Identity IE or in the SRB-Identity-v1700 IE as defined in TS 38.331 [10].

definitionList.name: PEIPS Assistance Information
descriptionList: This IE provides the information related to CN paging subgrouping for a particular UE, as specified in TS 38.304 [33].

definitionList.name: UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate List
descriptionList: The UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate List includes a list of UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate, each UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate is applicable for all PDU Sessions associated with a specific S-NSSAI of that UE, which is defined for the Downlink and the Uplink direction as specified in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: This IE indicates the UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate as specified in TS 23.501 [7] in the downlink direction.

elementList.name: UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: This IE indicates the UE Slice Maximum Bit Rate as specified in TS 23.501 [7] in the uplink direction.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of SLICE MAXIMUM BIT RATE for a UE. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: Positioning Information
descriptionList: This IE contains positioning information that assists in the SRS configuration of the UE.

elementList.name: Requested SRS Transmission Characteristics
elementList.description: Requested SRS Transmission Characteristics, as defined in TS 38.455 [49].

elementList.name: Routing ID
elementList.description: The maximum length corresponds to NfInstanceId defined in TS 29.571 [50].

elementList.name: NRPPa Transaction ID
elementList.description: NRPPa Transaction ID, as defined in TS 38.455 [49]

definitionList.name: MDT PLMN Modification List
descriptionList: The purpose of the MDT PLMN Modification List IE is to provide the modified list of PLMN allowed for MDT.

elementList.name: MDT PLMN Modification List
elementList.description: An empty list indicates there is no PLMN allowed for MDT.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of PLMNs in the MDT PLMN list. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: TAI NSAG Support List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the slice group mapping for all groups supported at the NG-RAN node per TAI.

elementList.name: NSAG Slice Support List
elementList.description: Indicates the list of slices which belong to the NSAG.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Slice Groups for the TAI. Value is 256.

definitionList.name: Excess Packet Delay Threshold Configuration
descriptionList: This IE defines the parameters for Excess Packet Delay Threshold configuration to support the calculation of the PDCP Excess Packet Delay in the UL per DRB as specified in TS 38.314 [42].

elementList.name: 5QI
elementList.description: Indicates the standardized or pre-configured 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [7]

elementList.name: Excess Packet Delay Threshold Value
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms0.25, ms0.5, ms1, ms2, ms4, ms5, ms10, ms20, ms30, ms40, ms50, ms60, ms70, ms80, ms90, ms100, ms150, ms300, ms500, …)

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of thresholds for Excess Packet Delay configuration. Value is 255.

definitionList.name: MT-SDT Information
descriptionList: This IE provides the assistance information for MT-SDT.

elementList.name: MT-SDT Data Size
elementList.description: Indicates the total data size for DL NAS signalling and user plane data for all SDT bearers. Unit: byte. Corresponds to the PDCP SDU size for the DL NAS signalling and the SDAP SDU size for the received DL user plane data. If the total data size exceeds 96000 bytes, the value is set to 96000.

definitionList.name: Partial UE Context Information for Positioning
descriptionList: This IE contains the UE context information within the PARTIAL UE CONTEXT TRANSFER message for NR Positioning.

elementList.name: Requested SRS Transmission Characteristics
elementList.description: Includes the Requested SRS Transmission Characteristics IE, as defined in TS 38.455 [49].

definitionList.name: DL LBT Failure Information
descriptionList: This IE contains information on DL LBT Failures at the target gNB that results in mobility failures.

elementList.name: UE Assistant Identifier
elementList.description: Allocated at the source gNB.

elementList.name: Number of DL LBT Failures
elementList.description: This IE indicates the number of DL LBT Failures, if available, occurring at the target gNB

definitionList.name: Aerial UE Subscription Information
descriptionList: This information element is used by the NG-RAN node to know if the UE is allowed to use aerial function, refer to TS 23.501 [7].

definitionList.name: NR A2X Services Authorized
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the authorization status of the UE to use the NR A2X services.

elementList.name: Aerial UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Aerial UE.

elementList.name: Aerial Controller UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Aerial Controller UE.

definitionList.name: LTE A2X Services Authorized
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the authorization status of the UE to use the LTE A2X services.

elementList.name: Aerial UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Aerial UE.

elementList.name: Aerial Controller UE
elementList.description: Indicates whether the UE is authorized as Aerial Controller UE.

definitionList.name: A2X PC5 QoS Parameters
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the A2X PC5 QoS parameters of the UE’s PC5 communication for A2X service.

elementList.name: PQI
elementList.description: PQI is a special 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: A2X PC5 Flow Bit Rates
elementList.description: Only applies for GBR QoS Flows.

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate for the A2X PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate for the A2X PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: Range
elementList.description: Only applies for groupcast.

elementList.name: A2X PC5 Link Aggregate Bit Rates
elementList.description: Only applies for non-GBR QoS Flows.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of A2X PC5 QoS flows allowed towards one UE. Value is 2048.

definitionList.name: UE Performance
descriptionList: This IE indicates the UE performance measurements metrics.

elementList.name: Average UE Throughput DL
elementList.description: Corresponds to Average UE Throughput DL per-UE as specified in TS 28.558 [58] clause 6.3.1.4.1.

elementList.name: Average UE Throughput UL
elementList.description: Corresponds to Average UE Throughput UL per-UE as specified in TS 28.558 [58] clause 6.3.1.4.2.

definitionList.name: Cell Based UE Trajectory Prediction
descriptionList: The Cell Based UE Trajectory Prediction IE contains information related to NG-RAN cells where the UE is predicted to connect.

elementList.name: Cell Based UE Trajectory Prediction
elementList.description: List of cells where the UE is predicted to connect, in chronological order. The first predicted cell added to the top of this list, is the cell in the target node where the UE will move to after the serving cell at the source node.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum number of cells that can be predicted for UE trajectory. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: Predicted Trajectory Cell Information
descriptionList: The Predicted Trajectory Cell Information IE contains information related to the predicted NG-RAN cells for cell based UE trajectory prediction.

elementList.name: Global NG-RAN Cell Identity
elementList.description: Indicates an NR Cell Identity.

elementList.name: Predicted Time UE Stays in Cell
elementList.description: The duration of time the UE is expected to stay in the cell, in seconds. If the duration is more than 4095s, this IE is set to 4095.

definitionList.name: Measured UE Trajectory
descriptionList: The Measured UE Trajectory IE contains information related to NG-RAN cells where the UE connected after being handed over to the target NG-RAN node.

elementList.name: Measured UE Trajectory
elementList.description: List of cells where the UE connected, in chronological order. Most recent information is added to the top of this list.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum number of cells that can be reported for UE trajectory. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: Measured Trajectory Cell Information
descriptionList: The Measured Trajectory Cell Information contains information related to the NG-RAN cells where a UE connected after being handed over to the target NG-RAN node.

elementList.name: Global NG-RAN Cell Identity
elementList.description: Indicates an NR Cell Identity.

elementList.name: Time UE Stayed in Cell
elementList.description: The duration of time the UE stayed in the cell If the duration is more than 4095s, this IE is set to 4095.

definitionList.name: Data Collection ID
descriptionList: This IE indicates the NG-RAN Node Measurement IDs which identify a Data Collection Reporting context.

elementList.name: NG-RAN node1 Measurement ID
elementList.description: Together with NG-RAN node2 Measurement ID, identifies a Data Collection Reporting context.

elementList.name: NG-RAN node2 Measurement ID
elementList.description: Together with NG-RAN node1 Measurement ID, identifies a Data Collection Reporting context.

definitionList.name: UE Trajectory Collection Configuration
descriptionList: This IE contains configurations for UE trajectory collection after successful handover.

elementList.name: Collection Time Duration for UE Trajectory
elementList.description: Time duration starting at successful handover within which UE Trajectory Information is collected. Unit: second

elementList.name: Number of Visited Cells
elementList.description: Maximum number of intra-node visited cells.

definitionList.name: UE Performance Collection Configuration
descriptionList: This IE indicates the configuration for UE performance measurement collection.

elementList.name: Collection Time Duration for UE Performance
elementList.description: Time duration starting at successful handover within which the UE performance measurements are collected. Unit: millisecond

definitionList.name: Average Packet Delay
descriptionList: This IE indicates the RAN part of the average packet delay in the UL and DL directions.

elementList.name: Average Packet Delay UL
elementList.description: Defined in TS 38.314 [42]. Unit: 0.1 millisecond

elementList.name: Average Packet Delay DL
elementList.description: Defined in TS 38.314 [42]. Unit: 0.1 millisecond

definitionList.name: Candidate Relay UE Info List
descriptionList: This IE contains the identity of the candidate relay UE(s) when the source NG-RAN decides to switch the UE to an indirect path at the target NG-RAN.

elementList.name: Candidate Relay UE ID
elementList.description: Includes the SL-SourceIdentity IE for the candidate relay UE as defined in TS 38.331 [10].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum number of candidate relay UE(s). The value is 32.

definitionList.name: Clock Quality Reporting Control Information
descriptionList: This IE indicates the clock quality reporting control information as defined in TS 23.501 [7].

definitionList.name: Clock Quality Acceptance Criteria
descriptionList: This IE indicates the clock quality acceptance criteria as defined in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: Synchronisation State
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents a synchronisation state. If a bit is set to "1", the respective synchronisation state is acceptable. If a bit is set to "0", the respective synchronisation state is not acceptable. Bits 3-7 reserved for future use.

elementList.name: Clock Frequency Stability
elementList.description: Indicates the offsetScaledLogVariance as specified in TS 23.501 [9].

elementList.name: Clock Accuracy
elementList.description: Clock accuracy expressed in units of 25 ns.

elementList.name: Parent Time Source
elementList.type: BIT STRING { syncE (0), pTP (1), gNSS (2), atomicClock (3), terrestrialRadio (4), serialTimeCode (5), nTP (6), handset (7), other (8) } (SIZE (16, …))
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents a parent time source. If a bit is set to "1", the respective parent time source is acceptable. If a bit is set to "0", the respective parent time source is not acceptable. Bits 9-15 reserved for future use.

definitionList.name: CAG List for MDT
descriptionList: This IE is used to identify the list of Public Network Integrated NPNs for MDT.

elementList.name: CAG List for MDT
elementList.description: For logged MDT, this list contains a maximum of 144 Public Network Integrated NPNs with a maximum of 12 different PLMN identities, configurable to the CAG-ConfigList IE defined in TS 38.331 [10] where a PLMN Identity may be repeated more than once.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of CAG IDs for MDT area scope. Value is 256.

elementList.name: S-CPAC Security Configurations List
elementList.description: Indicates the security configurations for S-CPAC, which will replace the previous configuration if any.

elementList.name: S-CPAC Multiple Target S-NG-RAN Node List
Target S-NG-RAN node ID
elementList.description: Other candidate SN under preparation for S-CPAC.

elementList.name: Recommended Candidate PSCells
elementList.description: Includes either the candidateCellInfoListMN in case of MN-initiated inter-SN S-CPAC or the candidateCellListCPC in case of SN-initiated inter-SN S-CPAC, contained in the CG-ConfigInfo message as defined in TS 38.331 [10],

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of the target S-NG-RAN nodes minus 1. Value is 7

elementList.name: S-NG-RAN node Security Key
elementList.description: The S-KSN which is provided by the M-NG-RAN node, see TS 33.501 [28].

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of S-CPAC security configurations. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: Complete Candidate Configuration Indicator
descriptionList: This IE indicates that the complete candidate configuration is used at the S-NG-RAN node for S-CPAC.

definitionList.name: NR Paging Long eDRX Information for RRC INACTIVE
descriptionList: This IE indicates the NR Paging long eDRX parameters as defined in TS 38.304 [33].

elementList.name: NR Paging Long eDRX Cycle for RRC INACTIVE
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (hf2, hf4, hf8, hf16, hf32, hf64, hf128, hf256, hf512, hf1024, …)
elementList.description: TeDRX, RAN defined in TS 38.304 [33]. Unit: [number of hyperframes].

elementList.name: NR Paging Time Window for RRC_INACTIVE
elementList.description: Unit: [1.28 seconds]

definitionList.name: MBS Assistance Information
descriptionList: This IE provides the MBS Assistance Information as specified in TS 38.300 [9] and TS 23.247 [46].

definitionList.name: QMC Coordination Request
descriptionList: This IE contains the information that the S-NG-RAN node needs to provide to the M-NG-RAN node, or the information that the M-NG-RAN node needs to provide to the S-NG-RAN node, for managing configuration and reporting of one or more QoE and/or RAN visible QoE measurements.

elementList.name: MN to SN QMC Coordination Request List
MN to SN QMC Coordination Request Item
QoE Reference
elementList.description: QoE Reference, as defined in clause 5.2 of TS 28.405 [55]. It consists of MCC+MNC+QMC ID, where the MCC and MNC are received with the QMC activation request from the management system to identify one PLMN hosting the management system, and QMC ID is a 3-byte Octet String.

elementList.name: Measurement Configuration Application Layer ID
elementList.description: This IE indicates the identity of the application layer measurement configuration, and corresponds to information provided in the MeasConfigAppLayerId IE as defined in TS 38.331 [10]. This IE is allocated by the M-NG-RAN node.

elementList.name: Measurement Collection Entity IP Address
elementList.description: The IP address of the entity receiving the QoE measurement report.

elementList.name: QoE Reporting Path Request
elementList.description: This IE indicates the preferred SRB for receiving the QoE reports.

elementList.name: RAN Visible QoE Reporting Path Request
elementList.description: This IE indicates the preferred SRB for receiving the RAN Visible QoE reports.

elementList.name: Further RAN Visible QoE Interest Inquiry
elementList.description: This IE is used by the M-NG-RAN node when the M-NG-RAN node is the RAN Visible QoE configuring node and the S-NG-RAN node provides the bearers for the application session, to request from the S-NG-RAN node to indicate whether the S-NG RAN node is interested in receiving further RVQoE reports.

elementList.name: Further RAN Visible QoE Reporting Path Inquiry
elementList.description: This IE is used by the M-NG-RAN node when the M-NG-RAN node is the RAN Visible QoE configuring node and the S-NG-RAN node provides the bearers for the application session, to request from the S-NG-RAN node the preferred SRB for receiving further RAN Visible QoE reports.

elementList.name: Current RAN Visible QoE Configuration
elementList.description: This IE is to indicate the current RAN Visible QoE configuration and inquire about the RAN Visible QoE Configuration preference of the S-NG-RAN node.

elementList.name: Configuration Release Indication
elementList.description: This IE indicates that the configuration has been released by the M-NG-RAN node.

elementList.name: SN to MN QMC Coordination Request List
SN to MN QMC Coordination Request Item
QoE Reference
elementList.description: QoE Reference, as defined in clause 5.2 of TS 28.405 [55]. It consists of MCC+MNC+QMC ID, where the MCC and MNC are received with the QMC activation request from the management system to identify one PLMN hosting the management system, and QMC ID is a 3-byte Octet String.

elementList.name: Measurement Collection Entity IP Address
elementList.description: The IP address of the entity receiving the QoE measurement report.

elementList.name: QoE Reporting Path Request
elementList.description: This IE indicates the preferred SRB for receiving the QoE reports.

elementList.name: RAN Visible QoE Reporting Path Request
elementList.description: This IE indicates the preferred SRB for receiving the RAN Visible QoE reports.

elementList.name: Further RAN Visible QoE Interest Inquiry
elementList.description: This IE is used by the S-NG-RAN node when the S-NG-RAN node is the RAN Visible QoE configuring node and the M-NG-RAN node provides the bearers for the application session, to request from the M-NG-RAN node to indicate whether the M-NG-RAN node is interested in receiving further RVQoE reports.

elementList.name: Further RAN Visible QoE Reporting Path
elementList.description: This IE is used by the M-NG-RAN node when the M-NG-RAN node is the RAN Visible QoE configuring node and the S-NG-RAN node provides the bearers for the application session, to request from the S-NG-RAN node to indicate whether the S-NG RAN node is interested in receiving further RVQoE reports.

elementList.name: Current RAN Visible QoE Configuration
elementList.description: This IE is to indicate the current RAN Visible QoE configuration.

elementList.name: Configuration Release Indication
elementList.description: This IE indicates that the configuration has been released by the S-NG-RAN node.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of simultaneous QoE measurement configurations at a UE. In this version of the specification, the value is 16.

definitionList.name: QMC Coordination Response
descriptionList: This IE contains the information that the M-NG-RAN node needs to provide to the S-NG-RAN node, or the information that the S-NG-RAN node needs to provide to the M-NG-RAN node in response to the QMC Coordination Request.

elementList.name: MN to SN QMC Coordination Response List
MN to SN QMC Coordination Response Item
QoE Reference
elementList.description: QoE Reference, as defined in clause 5.2 of TS 28.405 [55]. It consists of MCC+MNC+QMC ID, where the MCC and MNC are received with the QMC activation request from the management system to identify one PLMN hosting the management system, and QMC ID is a 3-byte Octet String.

elementList.name: Measurement Configuration Application Layer ID
elementList.description: This IE indicates the identity of the application layer measurement configuration, and corresponds to information provided in the MeasConfigAppLayerId IE as defined in TS 38.331 [10].

elementList.name: Further RAN Visible QoE Interest Response
elementList.description: This IE is to indicate whether the M-NG-RAN node is interested in receiving further RAN Visible QoE reports.

elementList.name: Further RAN Visible QoE Reporting Path Response
elementList.description: This IE indicates the preferred path for further RAN Visible QoE reporting.

elementList.name: Preferred RAN Visible QoE Configuration
elementList.description: The RAN Visible QoE Configuration preference of the M-NG-RAN node.

elementList.name: SN to MN QMC Coordination Response List
SN to MN QMC Coordination Response Item
QoE Reference
elementList.description: QoE Reference, as defined in clause 5.2 of TS 28.405 [55]. It consists of MCC+MNC+QMC ID, where the MCC and MNC are received with the QMC activation request from the management system to identify one PLMN hosting the management system, and QMC ID is a 3-byte Octet String.

elementList.name: RAN Visible QoE Reporting Path Response
Further RAN Visible QoE Interest Response
elementList.description: This IE indicates whether the S-NG-RAN node is interested in receiving further RAN Visible QoE reports.

elementList.name: Further RAN Visible QoE Reporting Path Response
elementList.description: This IE indicates the preferred path for further RAN Visible QoE reporting.

elementList.name: Preferred RAN Visible QoE Configuration
elementList.description: The RAN Visible QoE Configuration preference of the S-NG-RAN node.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of simultaneous QoE measurement configurations at a UE. In this version of the specification, the value is 16.

definitionList.name: QoE and RVQoE Reporting Paths
descriptionList: This IE indicates the SRB currently used for receiving the QoE reports and RAN visible QoE reports.

elementList.name: QoE Reporting Path
elementList.description: This IE indicates the SRB currently used for receiving the QoE reports.

elementList.name: RVQoE Reporting Path
elementList.description: This IE indicates the SRB currently used for receiving the RAN Visible QoE reports.

definitionList.name: RAN Visible QoE Configuration
descriptionList: This IE provides information of RAN visible QoE configuration.

elementList.name: CHO-CPAC Configuration Indicator
elementList.description: The value “cho-only-not-prepared” indicates that either CHO without SCG or CHO with SCG has not been prepared.

elementList.name: Target NG-RAN node To Source NG-RAN node Container
elementList.description: Includes the HandoverCommand message as defined in subclause 11.2.2 of TS 38.331 [10], if the target NG-RAN node is a gNB.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum number of the target S-NG-RAN nodes. Value is 8.
Maximum number of the candidate PSCells. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: PDU Set QoS Information
descriptionList: This IE defines the PDU Set QoS Information to be applied to a QoS flow.

elementList.name: PDU Set Delay Budget
elementList.description: PDU Set Delay Budget as defined in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: PDU Set Error Rate
elementList.description: PDU Set Error Rate as defined in TS 23.501 [7].

elementList.name: PDU Set Integrated Handling Information
elementList.description: PDU Set Integrated handling Information as defined in TS 23.501 [7].

definitionList.name: N6 Jitter Information
descriptionList: This IE indicates the N6 jitter information.

elementList.name: N6 Jitter Lower Bound
elementList.description: Indicates the lower bound of the N6 jitter. The unit is: 0.5ms.

elementList.name: N6 Jitter Upper Bound
elementList.description: Indicates the upper bound of the N6 jitter. The unit is: 0.5ms.

definitionList.name: ECN Marking or Congestion Information Reporting Request
descriptionList: This IE indicates to the NG-RAN node to perform ECN marking or to report information for ECN marking or to report congestion information for a QoS flow.

elementList.name: CHOICE ECN Marking or Congestion Information Request

definitionList.name: PDU Set based Handling Indicator
descriptionList: This IE indicates whether PDU Set based handling is supported for by the NG-RAN node.

definitionList.name: TAI Slice Unavailable Cell List
descriptionList: This IE is used by the NG-RAN to indicate resource configuration of a slice for the cells of the TA.

elementList.name: NR-CGI
elementList.description: Indicates the cells of the TAI configured with zero resources for the indicated slice.

elementList.name: NR-CGI
elementList.description: Indicates the cells configured with more than zero resources for the indicated slice in a TAI in which the other cells of the TAI have been configured with zero resources.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of signalled slice support items. Value is 65535.
Maximum no. of cells of the TAI configured with zero resources for the indicated slice. Value is 16384.

definitionList.name: Ranging and Sidelink Positioning Services Information
descriptionList: This IE provides information for UE’s Ranging and Sidelink Positioning services.

elementList.name: Ranging and Sidelink Positioning Authorized
elementList.description: This IE indicates whether the UE is authorized to use RSPP communication resources and SL-PRS resources.

elementList.name: RSPP Transport QoS Parameters
elementList.description: This IE applies only if the UE is authorized for Ranging and Sidelink Positioning service.

definitionList.name: RSPP Transport QoS Parameters
descriptionList: This IE provides information on the RSPP Transport QoS Parameters.

elementList.name: PQI
elementList.description: PQI is a special 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [9].

elementList.name: RSPP Transport Bit Rates
elementList.description: Only applies for GBR QoS flows.

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate for the RSPP QoS flow. Details in TS 23.501 [9].

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate for the RSPP QoS flow. Details in TS 23.501 [9].

elementList.name: Range
elementList.description: Only applies for groupcast.

elementList.name: RSPP Transport Link Aggregate Bit Rates
elementList.description: Only applies for Non-GBR QoS flows.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of RSPP QoS flows allowed towards one UE for NR Ranging and Positioning sidelink communication, the maximum value is 2048.

definitionList.name: User Plane Failure Indication
descriptionList: This IE is used to notify the S-NG-RAN node that a user plane failure occurred over NG-U interface.

elementList.name: User Plane Failure Type
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (GTP-U Error Indication Received, UP Path Failure, …)
elementList.description: Indicates the type of NG-U failure.

elementList.name: UL NG-U UP TNL Information
elementList.description: Identifies the NG-U transport bearer at the UPF node.

elementList.name: DL NG-U UP TNL Information
elementList.description: Identifies the NG-U transport bearer at the S-NG-RAN node.

definitionList.name: NRPPa Positioning Information
descriptionList: This IE contains positioning information that assists in the NG-RAN node to respond to the LMF.

elementList.name: Routing ID
elementList.description: The maximum length corresponds to NfInstanceId defined in TS 29.571 [50].

elementList.name: NRPPa Transaction ID
elementList.description: NRPPa Transaction ID, as defined in TS 38.455 [49]
